title: Feature Not Working as Expected
description: A user reports that the 'Export to PDF' feature is generating a corrupted file.

tasks.description: Gather details about the user's browser, operating system, and the specific data being exported.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects environment details to replicate the issue.

tasks.description: Attempt to replicate the issue using a test account with similar data and environment settings.
Log a detailed bug report for the engineering team, including replication steps and user details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-quality bug report.

tasks.description: Inform the user that the bug has been confirmed and provide an alternative export format (e.g., CSV) as a temporary workaround.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manages customer expectations and provides a temporary solution.
